faqs.question: What is Cloudemy Studio?
faqs.answer: Cloudemy Studio is a mobile app designed for teachers to easily record video lectures using images, PDFs, PPTs, and blank pages. It offers advanced annotation tools and high-quality video and audio support.

faqs.question: How do I record a lecture using Cloudemy Studio?
faqs.answer: You can import your teaching materials like images, PDFs, or PPTs into the app. Start recording your lecture while adding annotations, changing slides, and using tools to highlight key points.

faqs.question: Can I annotate during my lecture recording?
faqs.answer: Yes, Cloudemy Studio allows you to annotate your slides during the recording using tools like a pen, highlighter, shapes (lines, arrows, rectangles), and more.

faqs.question: What video quality options are available?
faqs.answer: Cloudemy Studio supports video recording in resolutions up to 4K, with customizable frame rates and bit rates, ensuring high-quality output.

faqs.question: Does the app support noise cancellation?
faqs.answer: Yes, the app comes with a noise cancellation feature to improve the clarity of your recorded audio.

faqs.question: Can I save my annotations and slides as images or PDFs?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can save slides with annotations as images or export them as a PDF for easy sharing with your students.

faqs.question: What file formats can I export my projects to?
faqs.answer: You can export your project as a .cslide file for future editing, sharing, or external use.

faqs.question: Does Cloudemy Studio auto-save my work?
faqs.answer: Yes, all imported content (images, PDFs, PPTs) and changes to slides are automatically saved, ensuring your project is secure.

faqs.question: Can I import existing materials into the app?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You can import images, PDFs, and PPTs into Cloudemy Studio, or even add blank pages to create new content.

faqs.question: Is the app free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Cloudemy Studio is completely free to use for teachers who want to record and share lectures without any cost.

faqs.question: What audio quality does Cloudemy Studio support?
faqs.answer: Cloudemy Studio supports single and dual-channel audio recording, with up to 320 kbps at 96kHz for crystal-clear audio.

faqs.question: How can I share my recorded lectures with students?
faqs.answer: When you record a video, it is automatically saved as an MP4 file in the Downloads/Cloudemy Studio/My Videos directory. You can easily share this video via email, cloud services, or other platforms from this location.

faqs.question: Does the app record the entire screen or just the lecture content?
faqs.answer: Cloudemy Studio records only your selected lecture content, excluding unwanted areas like navigation or status bars.

faqs.question: Can I change the background color of my slides?
faqs.answer: Yes, Cloudemy Studio allows you to customize the background color of your slides to suit your presentation style.

faqs.question: How do I export a project?
faqs.answer: You can export your project as a .cslide file or save the final video to your device for easy sharing.
